description: Non material amendment to approved application DM2019/01977 which allowed the "Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a part 1, part 3, part 5 and part 7 storey building for a mixed use redevelopment comprising of commercial space (flexible Class A1 or A3) on the ground floor with 48 residential units (Class C3) above with associated communal amenity space, cycle parking and refuse and recycling stores." to change the description of development to read as "Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site for a mixed-use development comprising commercial space (Class E: Commercial, Business and Service) on the ground floor with residential units (Class C3) above, with associated communal amenity space, cycle parking, refuse and recycling facilities"
decision_conditions: Pursuant to The Town and Country Planning (General Development Procedure) (amendment No 3) (England) Order 2009, the revisions to the description of proposal DM2019/01977, to read: 'Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site for a mixed-use development comprising commercial space (Class E: Commercial, Business and Service) on the ground floor with residential units (Class C3) above, with associated communal amenity space, cycle parking, refuse and recycling facilities';is considered not to be materially different from the approved scheme and may therefore be implemented without the need for further planning permission.
